title: Digital Puppet Masters Tournament Series

embed.description: This organization will run tournaments for teams of all ranks and skill level.

body:
Digital Puppet Masters Tournament Series.

Contact :- https://discord.gg/4fYdqnU 

Intro :-

Welcome to the Digital Puppet Masters Tournament Series. There will be 8 qualifying rounds, approx 1 per month. 
Winner qualifies for end of year Champion of Champions Series to be held in December.

Rules :-

All teams and players welcome. Random draw. First in first served. 
This is a knockout competition. Winners progress to the next round. Loser is eliminated.

Teams qualified for championship tournament cannot re-enter other qualifying rounds.
A unique code will be given to the winner of each qualifier.

Free to enter.

PRIZE MONEY
$100 first prize for each Qualifying Round Winner (This is coming from my own pocket).

+ Entry into the Champion of Champions tournament in December. $$$ TBD.(Riot contact me).

Schedule :- 
Each Tournament will be held over a 2 week period.
Week 1- Round of 32. 
Week 2- Finals.


Links
Round 1 - https://battlefy.com/digital-puppet-masters/digital-puppet-masters-t1/58c312f766cab44503f182b8/info

Round 2 - https://battlefy.com/digital-puppet-masters/digital-puppet-masters-t2/58c349834fee433003fd515a/info

Round 3 - https://battlefy.com/digital-puppet-masters/digital-puppet-masters-t3/58c44c42f6bb5d330352fbd7/info

Round 4 - https://battlefy.com/digital-puppet-masters/digital-puppet-masters-t4/58c44c43fd7f0f4603e31a70/info

first 4 rounds open for registration now.
